name: YouVersionDevotional-FlashBriefing
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This is the YouVersion Devotional Flash Briefing. Every day, we will bring you new content including the verse of the day, a devotional, and a prayer. We hope this helps you create a rhythm of experiencing God daily.

To interact more with the Bible on Alexa, just ask Alexa to enable the YOUVERSION BIBLE skill. 

Developed by YouVersion, YOUVERSION BIBLE for Alexa:
 ● Features 5 professionally narrated versions of the Bible
 ● Allows you to listen to any book, chapter, and verse of the Bible
 ● Lets you listen to your YouVersion daily reading plans and devotionals
 ● Has already been installed over 500,000 times
 ● And is completely free

The Bible App is also available for Android or iOS devices. Download it at bible.com/app, or try it online at Bible.com.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
